channel.title: 2 new AXOLOTI are not working
channel.description:
Hi! I've ordered 2 boards during kickstarter campaign, but tried them only now. Both boards are not working: one is not reacting to the power (both USB or external, no LEDs blinking).
Second board always ask for firmware update but never connects after update and ask for update again.
I have 3rd board that is working fine. What should I do?

item.title: 2 new AXOLOTI are not working
item.dc:creator: @vtol_1 Dmitriy
item.description:
@vtol_1 wrote:

It helped in both cases - thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: 2 new AXOLOTI are not working
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

In both cases, try a "rescue flash" indeed.
Main window -> Board menu -> Firmware -> Flash (rescue)

Read full topic

item.title: 2 new AXOLOTI are not working
item.dc:creator: @vtol_1 Dmitriy
item.description:
@vtol_1 wrote:

thanks for your replay! I'll try manual firmware rescue and describe everything to Johannes

I really like this boards... I hope i can do something

Read full topic

item.title: 2 new AXOLOTI are not working
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

sorry to hear that, not heard of many DOA axolotis, to have two is really unlucky.

the one that is asking constantly for firmware updates, you should try to do the manual firmware (rescue) update, details are in the user-guide section.. its sounds like the normal firmware update is not actually successfully doing the update. I've had that before and the rescue mode fixed it.

generally, you need to PM @Johannes to discuss , click on this link to see his profile, and use message. (ive raised your user to next level, so messaging is now available)

provide him with as many details as possible, KS email, pictures of boards, details of what you've tried so far e.g. different usb cables.

good luck, hope you get it fixed asap.

Read full topic
